item.title: Enjoy delicious autumn treats at The Shilla Seoul and The Shilla Jeju
item.description:
Source: The Shilla Seoul. Both the Shilla Seoul and Shilla Jeju hotels are celebrating autumn with a variety of special promotions and activities. The Shilla Seoul’s upscale Korean restaurant, La Yeon, will offer a special autumn menu featuring seasonal ingredients like pine nuts, sweet potatoes, and seafood in keeping with traditional culinary practices. La Yeon made its debut on the list of Asia’s 50 Best Restaurants in 2015 at position 38 and received the coveted One To Watch award...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/enjoy-delicious-autumn-treats-at-the-shilla-seoul-and-the-shilla-jeju/
